description: Data Source metrics grouped by the values in an annotation applied to the data sources

options.content: Data Sources Grouped by ${annotation_key}

targets.rawSql:
WITH params AS (
  SELECT
    $__from::bigint AS start_time_ms,
    $__to::bigint AS end_time_ms,
    $__interval_ms::bigint AS interval_ms
),
data AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket(
      (SELECT (interval_ms || ' milliseconds')::interval FROM params),
      timestamp
    ) AS time,
    data_source || ' (' || COALESCE(annotations->>'$annotation_key', 'Not Present') || ')' AS series_name,
    SUM(ingress_bytes) AS bytes
  FROM ts_ingresses
  WHERE
    timestamp >= to_timestamp((SELECT start_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND timestamp < to_timestamp((SELECT end_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND (
      (annotations ? '$annotation_key' AND (annotations->>'$annotation_key') IN ($annotation_value))
      OR 
      ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND NOT annotations ? '$annotation_key')
    )
  GROUP BY 1, 2
),
time_series AS (
  SELECT generate_series(
    time_bucket(
      (SELECT (interval_ms || ' milliseconds')::interval FROM params),
      to_timestamp((SELECT start_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    ),
    time_bucket(
      (SELECT (interval_ms || ' milliseconds')::interval FROM params),
      to_timestamp((SELECT end_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    ),
    (SELECT (interval_ms || ' milliseconds')::interval FROM params)
  ) AS time
),
all_series AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT series_name FROM data
),
all_combinations AS (
  SELECT time, series_name
  FROM time_series
  CROSS JOIN all_series
)
SELECT
  ac.time,
  ac.series_name,
  d.bytes AS bytes
FROM all_combinations ac
LEFT JOIN data d ON ac.time = d.time AND ac.series_name = d.series_name
ORDER BY ac.time, ac.series_name

FROM all_combinations ac

    ) AS time,

  SELECT
    $__from::bigint AS start_time_ms,
    $__to::bigint AS end_time_ms,
    $__interval_ms::bigint AS interval_ms
),
data AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket(
      (SELECT (interval_ms || ' milliseconds')::interval FROM params),
      timestamp
    ) AS time,
    data_source || ' (' || COALESCE(annotations->>'$annotation_key', 'Not Present') || ')' AS series_name,
    COUNT(*) AS files
  FROM ts_filters
  WHERE
    timestamp >= to_timestamp((SELECT start_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND timestamp < to_timestamp((SELECT end_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND (
      (annotations ? '$annotation_key' AND (annotations->>'$annotation_key') IN ($annotation_value))
      OR 
      ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND NOT annotations ? '$annotation_key')
    )
  GROUP BY 1, 2
),
time_series AS (
  SELECT generate_series(
    time_bucket(
      (SELECT (interval_ms || ' milliseconds')::interval FROM params),

    ),

WITH params AS (
  SELECT
    $__from::bigint AS start_time_ms,
    $__to::bigint AS end_time_ms
),
ingress_data AS (
  SELECT
    data_source,
    COALESCE(annotations->>'$annotation_key', 'Not Present') AS annotation_value,
    SUM(ingress_bytes) AS total_ingress_bytes,
    COUNT(*) AS ingress_files
  FROM ts_ingresses
  WHERE
    timestamp >= to_timestamp((SELECT start_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND timestamp < to_timestamp((SELECT end_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND (
      (annotations ? '$annotation_key' AND (annotations->>'$annotation_key') IN ($annotation_value))
      OR 
      ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND NOT annotations ? '$annotation_key')
    )
  GROUP BY 1, 2
),
egress_data AS (
  SELECT
    data_source,
    COALESCE(annotations->>'$annotation_key', 'Not Present') AS annotation_value,
    SUM(egress_bytes) AS total_egress_bytes,
    COUNT(*) AS egress_files
  FROM ts_egresses
  WHERE
    timestamp >= to_timestamp((SELECT start_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND timestamp < to_timestamp((SELECT end_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND (
      (annotations ? '$annotation_key' AND (annotations->>'$annotation_key') IN ($annotation_value))
      OR 
      ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND NOT annotations ? '$annotation_key')
    )
  GROUP BY 1, 2
),
error_data AS (
  SELECT
    data_source,
    COALESCE(annotations->>'$annotation_key', 'Not Present') AS annotation_value,
    COUNT(*) AS error_files
  FROM ts_errors
  WHERE
    timestamp >= to_timestamp((SELECT start_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND timestamp < to_timestamp((SELECT end_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND (
      (annotations ? '$annotation_key' AND (annotations->>'$annotation_key') IN ($annotation_value))
      OR 
      ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND NOT annotations ? '$annotation_key')
    )
  GROUP BY 1, 2
),
filter_data AS (
  SELECT
    data_source,
    COALESCE(annotations->>'$annotation_key', 'Not Present') AS annotation_value,
    COUNT(*) AS filter_files
  FROM ts_filters
  WHERE
    timestamp >= to_timestamp((SELECT start_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND timestamp < to_timestamp((SELECT end_time_ms FROM params) / 1000)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND (
      (annotations ? '$annotation_key' AND (annotations->>'$annotation_key') IN ($annotation_value))
      OR 
      ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND NOT annotations ? '$annotation_key')
    )
  GROUP BY 1, 2
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(i.data_source, e.data_source, er.data_source, f.data_source) AS data_source,
  COALESCE(i.annotation_value, e.annotation_value, er.annotation_value, f.annotation_value) AS annotation_value,
  COALESCE(i.total_ingress_bytes, 0) AS total_ingress_bytes,
  COALESCE(i.ingress_files, 0) AS ingress_files,
  COALESCE(e.total_egress_bytes, 0) AS total_egress_bytes,
  COALESCE(e.egress_files, 0) AS egress_files,
  COALESCE(er.error_files, 0) AS error_files,
  COALESCE(f.filter_files, 0) AS filter_files
FROM ingress_data i
FULL OUTER JOIN egress_data e
  ON i.data_source = e.data_source AND i.annotation_value = e.annotation_value
FULL OUTER JOIN error_data er
  ON i.data_source = er.data_source AND i.annotation_value = er.annotation_value
FULL OUTER JOIN filter_data f
  ON i.data_source = f.data_source AND i.annotation_value = f.annotation_value
ORDER BY data_source, annotation_value

list.definition:
WITH all_sources AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_ingresses WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_egresses WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_filters WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
),
distinct_sources AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source
  FROM all_sources
  WHERE data_source IS NOT NULL AND data_source != ''
)
SELECT data_source
FROM (
  SELECT data_source FROM distinct_sources
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'No Datasources' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM distinct_sources)
) subquery
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN data_source = 'No Datasources' THEN 0 
    ELSE 1 
  END,
  data_source
list.label: Data Sources
list.name: datasources
list.query:
WITH all_sources AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_ingresses WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_egresses WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_filters WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
),
distinct_sources AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT data_source
  FROM all_sources
  WHERE data_source IS NOT NULL AND data_source != ''
)
SELECT data_source
FROM (
  SELECT data_source FROM distinct_sources
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'No Datasources' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM distinct_sources)
) subquery
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN data_source = 'No Datasources' THEN 0 
    ELSE 1 
  END,
  data_source

list.definition:
WITH all_keys AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(annotations) AS key FROM ts_ingresses WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(annotations) AS key FROM ts_egresses WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(annotations) AS key FROM ts_errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(annotations) AS key FROM ts_filters WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
),
distinct_keys AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT key
  FROM all_keys
)
SELECT key
FROM (
  SELECT key FROM distinct_keys
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'No Annotations' AS key
) subquery
WHERE 
  key = 'No Annotations' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM distinct_keys)
  OR
  key != 'No Annotations'
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN key = 'No Annotations' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  key
list.label: Annotation Key
list.name: annotation_key
list.query:
WITH all_keys AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(annotations) AS key FROM ts_ingresses WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(annotations) AS key FROM ts_egresses WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(annotations) AS key FROM ts_errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(annotations) AS key FROM ts_filters WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
),
distinct_keys AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT key
  FROM all_keys
)
SELECT key
FROM (
  SELECT key FROM distinct_keys
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'No Annotations' AS key
) subquery
WHERE 
  key = 'No Annotations' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM distinct_keys)
  OR
  key != 'No Annotations'
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN key = 'No Annotations' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  key

list.definition:
WITH all_values AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT annotations->>'$annotation_key' AS value
  FROM ts_ingresses
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT annotations->>'$annotation_key' AS value
  FROM ts_egresses
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT annotations->>'$annotation_key' AS value
  FROM ts_errors
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT annotations->>'$annotation_key' AS value
  FROM ts_filters
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
),
distinct_values AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT value
  FROM all_values
  WHERE value IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT value
FROM (
  SELECT value FROM distinct_values
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Not Present'
) subquery
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN value = 'Not Present' THEN 1
    ELSE 0 
  END,
  value
list.label: Annotation Value
list.name: annotation_value
list.query:
WITH all_values AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT annotations->>'$annotation_key' AS value
  FROM ts_ingresses
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT annotations->>'$annotation_key' AS value
  FROM ts_egresses
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT annotations->>'$annotation_key' AS value
  FROM ts_errors
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT annotations->>'$annotation_key' AS value
  FROM ts_filters
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
),
distinct_values AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT value
  FROM all_values
  WHERE value IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT value
FROM (
  SELECT value FROM distinct_values
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Not Present'
) subquery
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN value = 'Not Present' THEN 1
    ELSE 0 
  END,
  value

title: Data Source by Annotation
